blogPost.excerpt: Archimedes is the investment learning hub for everyone. Make investing a bigger part of your life by learning from a personal curriculum of bite-sized lessons, fun gameplay, and from a trusted community. Sign up and become a better investor today.
blogPost.body: Archimedes is the investment learning hub for everyone. Make investing a bigger part of your life by learning from a personal curriculum of bite-sized lessons, fun gameplay, and from a trusted community. Sign up and become a better investor today.
blogPost.title: Archimedes - Investment learning hub for everyone
blogPost.author: Clair Byrd

localize.description: 阿基米德是大家的投资学习中心。通过从个人课程、有趣的游戏和值得信赖的社区学习，让投资成为您生活中更大的一部分。立即注册，成为更好的投资者。
localize.tagline: 每个人的投资学习中心

localize.description: 阿基米德是大家的投資學習中心。通過從個人課程、有趣的遊戲和值得信賴的社區學習，讓投資成爲您生活中更大的一部分。立即註冊，成爲更好的投資者。
